body.p: This topic contains information about how you can reference videos from your HTML or XML documents.

For HTML, the video tag can be used without any other styling in your CSS files:... <video data="path/to/video.mp4" format="mp4" width="480" height="270"> <source src="path/to/video.mp4"/> </video> ...
Prefer using absolute paths for data and src values like src="file:/C:/absolute/path/to/video.mp4".
Both width and height attributes aren't mandatory.

section.title: Customize Video Cover Placeholder
section.p: By default a placeholder is displayed in-place of the video, this placeholder when clicked will launch the video.
